name: Abbas Kakar
story: Abbas Kakar was born in a small village in Iran. He joined the military at a young age and quickly showed exceptional skill as a sharpshooter. He was promoted to Corporal and sent to fight for the OPFOR faction in Arma 3. Abbas is known for his focused and composed personality in the heat of battle, which has earned him the respect of his fellow soldiers. Despite his dedication to his mission, Abbas always keeps in mind the well-being of his wife and two children who live back in his village.
